unnormalised: Hey Influencers, are you REALLY understanding your Insta audience? New follower analytics are dropping, and they’re more insightful than your chai-time auntie's gossip!
normalised: Hey Influencers, are you really understanding your Insta audience? New follower analytics are dropping, and they’re more insightful than your chai-time auntie's gossip!

unnormalised: Forget just likes and comments, we're talking deep dives. Which of your followers in Mumbai are consistently engaging at 2 PM on Tuesdays? Which demographic resonates most with your Diwali recipe reels? Are your Delhi followers different from your Chennai crowd?
normalised: Forget just likes and comments, we're talking deep dives. Which of your followers in Mumbai are consistently engaging at two P M on Tuesdays? Which demographic resonates most with your Diwali recipe reels? Are your Delhi followers different from your Chennai crowd?

unnormalised: Platforms are now offering granular data – age breakdowns, location heatmaps, even insights into what OTHER content your followers are enjoying. Think about the possibilities! Tailor your content, optimize your posting schedule (aim for that sweet spot around 6:30 PM, maybe?), and finally understand if your paid promotions are truly converting.
normalised: Platforms are now offering granular data – age breakdowns, location heatmaps, even insights into what other content your followers are enjoying. Think about the possibilities! Tailor your content, optimize your posting schedule (aim for that sweet spot around six thirty P M, maybe?), and finally understand if your paid promotions are truly converting.

unnormalised: Don’t just blindly post, strategize! Check out the new analytics features launching on 26/01/2024. Learn to read the data. Trust us, understanding your followers is more valuable than a 10,000 Rs. lehenga during wedding season. Get analyzing – your engagement rate will thank you for it!
normalised: Don’t just blindly post, strategize! Check out the new analytics features launching on twenty six january two thousand and twenty four. Learn to read the data. Trust us, understanding your followers is more valuable than a ten thousand rupee lehenga during wedding season. Get analyzing – your engagement rate will thank you for it!
